items.sentence: Tom began doing drugs when he was a teenager.
Tom asked Mary to tell him what he should do.
Tom is out in the yard, playing with his dog.
Tom is still too young to do that by himself.
Tom is sitting in the back of the auditorium.
Tom is likely to do that when he's in Boston.
Tom is going to have an operation in October.
Tom is going to do that on October 20th, too.
Tom is going to call me sometime before 2:30.
Tom is going to be sentenced on October 20th.
Tom is almost always at home on October 20th.
Tom has published another controversial book.
Tom has been trying to do what can't be done.
Tom has been sending Mary messages every day.
Tom has been searching for his birth parents.
Tom has been a lot more cooperative recently.
Tom grew up on the other side of the country.
Tom got injured trying to break up the fight.
Tom expects to do that again on October 20th.
Tom drank most of the beer that we'd brought.
